name: eyewitness-ui
description: User interface to allow admins to interact with their Eyewitness bot.

scripts.deploy-all-production: npm run deploy-demo-production && npm run deploy-battabox-production && npm run deploy-sabc-production && npm run deploy-thestar-production
scripts.deploy-demo-production: docker build -f Dockerfile -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-demo/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-demo/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-demo web
scripts.deploy-battabox-production: docker build -f Dockerfile -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-battabox/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-battabox/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-battabox web
scripts.deploy-sabc-production: docker build -f Dockerfile -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-sabc/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-sabc/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-sabc web
scripts.deploy-thestar-production: docker build -f Dockerfile -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-thestar/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-thestar/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-thestar web
scripts.deploy-all-staging: npm run deploy-demo-staging && npm run deploy-battabox-staging && npm run deploy-sabc-staging && npm run deploy-thestar-staging
scripts.deploy-demo-staging: docker build -f Dockerfile.staging -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-demo-staging/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-demo-staging/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-demo-staging web
scripts.deploy-battabox-staging: docker build -f Dockerfile.staging -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-battabox-stag/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-battabox-stag/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-battabox-stag web
scripts.deploy-sabc-staging: docker build -f Dockerfile.staging -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-sabc-staging/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-sabc-staging/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-sabc-staging web
scripts.deploy-thestar-staging: docker build -f Dockerfile.staging -t registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-thestar-staging/web . && docker push registry.heroku.com/eyewitness-ui-thestar-staging/web && heroku container:release -a eyewitness-ui-thestar-staging web

author: Atchai <enquiries@atchai.com> (https://atchai.com)
